titleStmt.title: Boaz and Ruth a disquisition upon Deut. 25, 5, concerning the brothers propagating the name and memory of his elder brother deceased : in which the antiquity, reason, and circumstances of that law are explained, the mistakes and impositions of the Jewish rabbins, in this and other matters detected ... / by John Turner ...
titleStmt.author: Turner, John, b. 1649 or 50.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H. Hills, Jun., for Walter Kettilby ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
Some pages are stained, misnumbered, and have print show-through; p. 100, 115, and 119 have print faded in filmed copy. Pages 100-125 photographed from Bodleian Library copy and inserted at the end.
